name: Firetrap Arcade (1986) recreation
description:
Rescue people!  Find power-ups! Reach the top of the building!

This is Firetrap, an old arcade game. I recreated the gameplay mechanics.

This is not a polished product, but you might still have fun trying to beat your highscore. Unfortunately, I did not have the time to finish all parts, such as the UI. The game was made by me and we had 7 weeks to make it.
Played with controller.

Made in Unreal Engine 5.0
